website_summaries.verdict: The Bare Access Arc 4 from Merrell is a running companion that many athletes and casual individuals can enjoy. It’s a neutral running shoe that’s catered to minimalist enthusiasts. Its durability is superb and the underfoot comfort is adequate, but it doesn’t have arch supports.
pros: The upper coverage of this running shoe comes from the Synthetic Leather & Air Mesh
Most reviewers appreciated this 4th version’s overall comfortable design and unbulky nature
The lightweight disposition of the Bare Access Arc 4 is a positive feature for testers
It’s a running shoe that’s effective for many activities, such as running, exercising or even walking
The durability of the individual parts is also very dependable
The minimal cushioning is able to offer protection, comfort and surface control for the runner
cons: There were complaints with regard to the Merrell Bare Access Arc 4 being a bit narrow for the feet
There is little support for the arch, therefore it’s not the best option for over-pronators
Some runners noted that the aesthetic of this shoe was too similar to the previous versions
Some reviewers felt that the upper unit wasn’t able to snugly wrap their feet properly

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant shoes
customer_reviews.text: My favourite Merrell shoe to date. I have worn the Pace Glove shoes for a long time mainly for walking or short runs though as while very comfortable the soles are very thin. The padding on these though made them extremely comfortable for longer road runs. Wore them for Loch Ness Marathon and several other road races and my legs and feet felt great after. They have helped me transition fully to minimalist running. There feels to be some slight arch support which when running helps make sure you always land forefoot first. I wear them all the time - walking, working and running!
customer_reviews.author: Louise G

customer_reviews.title: The best trainers I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best trainers I've ever bought. They are lightweight, comfortable, and fit perfectly. I'll definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie James Fiction

customer_reviews.title: Never had smell feet!!!/
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable light shoes. Walk miles in them. But I do not have smelly feet!!! For some reason they smell and make my feet smell. They are airy so I do not unstand why. They gave been washed and now in a bag with air freshener! Big problem so 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: hammer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Merrell
customer_reviews.text: I am a loyal and happy Merrell customer, their shoes fit me very well and I use almost all of their range. very happy with this purchase. great colour and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Zendon Dendon

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these light weight Merrell shoes. This is my 3rd pair. They are perfect for holiday walking (Universal Studios!) and a good all rounder sports shoe. They are instantly comfortable and the fabric allows your feet to breathe so they stay cool even on hot days. I rarely wear socks with them as they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and she's very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these for walking. Feel great, very comfortable and so light, you hardly feel you're wearing anything,

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really comfy trainers, this is the second pair I have bought

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these for walking. Feel great, very comfortable and so light.

customer_reviews.title: Am doing WalkActive and these shoes really let you toes ...
customer_reviews.text: Am doing WalkActive and these shoes really let you toes spread which is a very important part of this walking regime.

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and surprisingly warm
customer_reviews.text: Very light, comfortable and surprisingly warm. They have a sleek look and great support.

customer_reviews.title: My fantastic Merrell bare access trainers
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with my Merrell bare access trainers they are fantastic

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic running shoe; fits perfect around my foot, nice colors and a lot of space for my toes, in time I will get used to look down on the footshaped too - highly recommanded
customer_reviews.author: Malene Bjørn Ahrenkiel

customer_reviews.title: Lovely if you dont want to wear them!
customer_reviews.text: They look great until you wear them! The fit is fine but I do a lot of running and walking and wanted a good pair of lightweight running shoes. You can feel every stone that you tread on. I usually buy 20 quid trainers and wish I hadn't thrown them out as they were more comfortable. Really wished I had returned them as missed the return deadline. Definitely try before you buy it think. Live and learn
customer_reviews.author: Trampoline Queen

customer_reviews.title: So so.....
customer_reviews.text: Definitely made small - had to return and get a half size larger. Bought as recommended for Plantar Fasciatis - have to say this has not helped in any way so if you are buying solely for this reason then might not be the trainer for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Katherine Arnott

customer_reviews.title: Was a bit disappointed with the trainer I thought they were similar to ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was prompt. Was a bit disappointed with the trainer I thought they were similar to my barefoot merrell said I already have. But they are not as pliable bit more sturdy like normal trainers
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: It feels so light! The shape is not suitable ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels so light! The shape is not suitable for wide feet unfortunately. It is more of a uniform width - so it's either too tight for the arch or too loose for heels.
customer_reviews.author: niceday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoes personally recommended to me by walking guru Joanna Hall!
customer_reviews.author: Frederica Agbah

customer_reviews.title: The trainers are super comfy and so light weight
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. The trainers are super comfy and so light weight. I bought these as I have a similar pair that I've been wearing for over a year for when they wear out (still in good condition at the moment) and they didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Bare Access Arc 4 Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description:
These Bare Access 4 shoes from Merrell feature mesh and TPU upper. These shoes also feature traditional lace closure along with reflective details for increased visibility in low light. Compression moulded EVA midsole for stability and comfort. The outsole is made out of Vibram.

MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION
What began in the Green Mountains in Vermont, USA, now roams the world. For over 26 years, Merrell has been providing outdoor enthusiasts with quality performance footwear. As the needs of the outdoor enthusiasts have changed, so too has Merrell's approach to addressing those needs. The concept of outdoor has broadened overtime, to include all types of activities and environments - both natural and urban. Merrell is driven to keep pace with this evolution of The New Outdoor concept, and continues to evolve. It has been written that what is important is not the destination, but the journey. So join us as we take you through the Merrell journey - from all-leather hiking boots to plastic telemarking boots to the moc that created the Aftersport category.
feature_bullets: Low-profile trail runner featuring breathable mesh upper with reflective overlays
